questions.text: What methods are used to describe the data before any predictive modeling is performed?
Which data modality-specific preprocessing techniques are used?
Which feature engineering techniques are used?
Which type of data augmentation and/or generation is used?
Predictive models can be used for various purposes, e.g., accurate prediction, causal inference, survival analysis, or others. What is the main purpose of the predictive models used in this study?
Which type of explainability techniques are used?
Which evaluation metrics are used to assess the predictive models?
